name: perl-perl-critic

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Critique Perl source code for best-practices.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-b-keywords
dependencies.description: Lists of reserved barewords and symbol names

dependencies.name: perl-config-tiny
dependencies.description: Read/Write .ini style files with as little code as possible

dependencies.name: perl-exception-class
dependencies.description: A module that allows you to declare real exception classes in Perl

dependencies.name: perl-file-which
dependencies.description: Perl implementation of the which utility as an API

dependencies.name: perl-list-someutils
dependencies.description: Provide the stuff missing in List::Util

dependencies.name: perl-module-pluggable
dependencies.description: Automatically give your module the ability to have plugins

dependencies.name: perl-pod-parser
dependencies.description: Modules for parsing/translating POD format documents

dependencies.name: perl-ppi
dependencies.description: Parse, Analyze and Manipulate Perl (without perl)

dependencies.name: perl-ppix-quotelike
dependencies.description: Parse Perl string literals and string-literal-like things.

dependencies.name: perl-readonly
dependencies.description: Readonly - Facility for creating read-only scalars, arrays, hashes

dependencies.name: perl-string-format
dependencies.description:
Sprintf-like string formatting capabilities with arbitrary format
definitions

dependent_to.name: perl-perl-critic-moose
dependent_to.description: Policies for Perl::Critic concerned with using Moose
